SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 rowNum , aa.mbrClientName , aa.pdtName , aa.pdtPrice , SUM(aa.sumMotQuentity) sumMotQuentity , SUM(aa.sumMotAmt) sumMotAmt , SUM(aa.sumWshQuentity) sumWshQuentity , SUM(aa.sumWshAmt) sumWshAmt , SUM(aa.sumOrtQuentity) sumOrtQuentity , SUM(aa.sumOrtAmt) sumOrtAmt , SUM(aa.sumWshQuentity) - SUM(aa.sumOrtQuentity) stkQuentity , SUM(aa.sumWshAmt) - SUM(aa.sumOrtAmt) stkAmt FROM (SELECT c.mbrClientName , b.pdtName , b.pdtPrice , SUM(a.motCount) sumMotQuentity , SUM(a.motAmt) sumMotAmt , 0 sumWshQuentity , 0 sumWshAmt , 0 sumOrtQuentity , 0 sumOrtAmt FROM myorderdetail a JOIN product b ON b.pdtSeq = a.pdtSeq JOIN members c ON c.mbrSeq = b.mbrSeq GROUP BY c.mbrClientName , b.pdtName , b.pdtPrice UNION SELECT d.mbrClientName , c.pdtName , c.pdtPrice , 0 , 0 , SUM(a.whsCount) sumWshQuentity , SUM(a.whsCount*c.pdtPrice) sumWshAmt , 0 , 0 FROM warehousing a JOIN myorderdetail b ON b.motSeq = a.motSeq JOIN product c ON c.pdtSeq = b.pdtSeq JOIN members d ON d.mbrSeq = c.mbrSeq GROUP BY d.mbrClientName , c.pdtName , c.pdtPrice UNION SELECT c.mbrClientName , b.pdtName , b.pdtPrice , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , SUM(a.ortCount) sumOrtQuentity , SUM(a.ortAmt) sumOrtAmt FROM orderdetail a JOIN product b ON b.pdtSeq = a.pdtSeq JOIN members c ON c.mbrSeq = b.mbrSeq WHERE IFNULL(a.ortShippingCd,'X') <> 'X' GROUP BY c.mbrClientName , b.pdtName , b.pdtPrice ) aa WHERE 1 = 1 AND (@ROWNUM := 0) = 0
AND aa.mbrClientName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%') AND aa.pdtName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
GROUP BY aa.mbrClientName , aa.pdtName , aa.pdtPrice
